question: You went to your friend house and had meal. Write a letter to your friend thanking him and his family for the meal.1) Tell what you enjoyed about the meal.2) Thanks to his parents and what you think about them 3) suggest arrangements for his invite at your place.
text: I hope this letter finds you in good health. I am very thankful to you for the meal which I shared with you and your family last week.

Firstly, we had a good time that weekend and enjoyed the food that is cooked by your mother and sister. Every food item including starters and snacks was very delicious. However, I like the taste of a sweet dish which was served last the most.

Moreover, eating with your whole family was very special as well as a memorable moment for me. They all were amazing and treated me as a member of their family thus, I would really like to thank your parents.

It was totally a joyful day and I also want to invite you and your family members for the dinner. It would be amazing if you could manage your schedule and spare some time to come and eat with me on any day which is suitable for you.
Pay regards to your family from my side.
